In this scenario, my own payoff is the same regardless of the choice (400). Therefore, my decision rests on how it affects Person A. Option 'Right' provides a higher payoff (750) to Person A compared to Option 'Left' (400). Since the outcome doesn't negatively affect me, and improves the outcome for another, I will choose the option that increases the total benefit.
